definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: This type of data communication is relatively cheap and simple.
sentences.chinese: 这种数据通信相对来说比较便宜和简单。

sentences.english: How are broadband services different from traditional dial-up services?
sentences.chinese: 宽频好吗服务不同的传统国内拨接式数据通信服务？

sentences.english: The hinge is that the enterprise subsists on suiting the development of data communication.
sentences.chinese: 适应数据通信的发展是通信企业生存的关键。

sentences.english: These protocols support high bit rate voice and limited data communications.
sentences.chinese: 这些协议支持高比特率语音和有限的数据通信功能。

sentences.english: The software and communication protocol of measurement and control stations are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了测量站和主控站的软件，以及数据通信协议。

sentences.english: A peripheral part of that crew’s duties was taking care of the company’s data communications systems.
sentences.chinese: 那个班组有一部分工作是负责公司的数据通信系统。

sentences.english: In the system of AMRS, data traffic is a all-important of aspect.
sentences.chinese: 在自动抄表系统中，数据通信是非常重要的一个方面。

sentences.english: Security for data communication is another important aspect to consider.
sentences.chinese: 数据通信的安全是要考虑的另一个重要方面。

sentences.english: Special wireless data network indicates mobile narrow-band data communication network.
sentences.chinese: 无线专网是指目前国外流行的窄带移动数据通信系统。

pinyin: yi2 dong4 tong1 xin4 wang3 luo4
